category.name: Administration.eIntegrator
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: EINT_form_refresh_pref
preference.preference_description: Controls whether or not the refresh operation updates the form data from the external source. Valid Values: 0 - The form data is not updated when the refresh operation is run. 1 - A SQL query runs and fetches the external data every time the form is refreshed.
